original_text: building your vaulted chamber at the head of every street, and making your lofty place in every square. Yet you were not like a prostitute, because you scorned payment.
korean_text: 네가 누각을 모든 길 어귀에 건축하며 높은 대를 모든 거리에 쌓고도 값을 싫어하니 창기 같지도 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: building your vaulted chamber at the head of every street
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 길머리에 너의 높은 처소를 세우고

sentences.original_text: and making your lofty place in every square
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 광장에 너의 높은 곳을 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: Yet you were not like a prostitute
